title: Coach Mack Brown - Live from SXSW Part 2
description: Former head coach of the University of Texas Longhorns, Mack Brown joins Chuck in Austin to talk about football's future, and how the college football playoff could be reformed.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
